<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@400;600;700&display=swap"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/orioncactus/pretendard/dist/web/static/pretendard.css">

<style>
html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background:
    radial-gradient(circle at 0% 0%, #ffffff 0, transparent 55%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 100% 100%, #a3d9ff 0, transparent 55%),
    #E8F6FF;
  font-family: "Poppins", "Pretendard", sans-serif;
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

/* NAVBAR ----------------------- */
nav.navbar {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0; left: 0; right: 0;
  background: transparent !important;
  padding: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
}
.navbar-toggler { display: none !important; }

.navbar-brand {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%; left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.16em;
  color: #B8B8B8 !important;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.navbar .container-fluid { position: relative; }

.quarto-navbar-tools {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

/* + BUTTON ----------------------- */
.icon-plus {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  color: #B8B8B8;
  font-size: 2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  width: 42px;
  height: 42px;
  border-radius: 14px;

  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;

  transition:
    background 0.25s ease,
    color 0.25s ease,
    box-shadow 0.35s ease;
}
.icon-plus-symbol {
  transition: transform 0.35s ease;
  transform-origin: center;
}
.icon-plus:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.18);
  color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
}
.icon-plus.open {
  color: #fff;
  box-shadow:
    0 0 16px rgba(255,255,255,0.9),
    0 0 26px rgba(163,217,255,1);
}
.icon-plus.open .icon-plus-symbol {
  transform: rotate(45deg) scale(1.07);
}

/* MENU ----------------------- */
.navbar-collapse {
  display: none !important;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(-12px);
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity 0.32s ease, transform 0.32s ease;
}
.navbar-collapse.open {
  display: block !important;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50px; right: 0;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.65);
  padding: 10px 0;
  min-width: 180px;
  border-radius: 14px;

  backdrop-filter: blur(18px);
  box-shadow: 0 16px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.55);
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.navbar-collapse .navbar-nav { flex-direction: column; }
.navbar-collapse .nav-link {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  color: #EDEDED !important;
}
.navbar-collapse .nav-link:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.18);
  color: white !important;
}

/* PAGE TITLE ----------------------- */
.page-title, h1.title {
  position: absolute;
  top: 14px;
  left: 0;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #CFCFCF !important;
  text-shadow: 0 3px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  z-index: 999;
}

/* TOP TEXT ----------------------- */
.about-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 40%;
  left: 12%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  text-align: left;

  font-size: 1.05rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1.85rem;

  color: #8A8A8A;
  text-shadow:
    0 0 5px rgba(255,255,255,0.32),
    0 0 14px rgba(163,217,255,0.35);
}

/* DESCRIPTION TEXT ----------------------- */
.about-desc {
  position: absolute;
  top: 58%;             /* ← 확실히 넓힌 간격 */
  left: 12%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  text-align: left;

  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1.85rem;

  color: #8A8A8A;
  text-shadow:
    0 0 4px rgba(255,255,255,0.30),
    0 0 10px rgba(163,217,255,0.30);

  max-width: 70%;
}

/* 개별 앨범 아이템 설정 */
.playlist-item {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  width: calc(20% - 20px); /* 한 줄에 5개 배치를 위한 계산 (100%/5 - 간격) */

}

.playlist-item:hover {

}

.album-art {

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const navbar = document.querySelector("nav.navbar");
  const tools = navbar.querySelector(".quarto-navbar-tools");

  let plusBtn = tools.querySelector("#plusMenuButton");
  if (!plusBtn) {
    plusBtn = document.createElement("button");
    plusBtn.id = "plusMenuButton";
    plusBtn.className = "icon-plus";
    plusBtn.innerHTML = '<span class="icon-plus-symbol">+</span>';
    tools.appendChild(plusBtn);
  }

  const collapse = navbar.querySelector(".navbar-collapse");

  plusBtn.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    plusBtn.classList.toggle("open");
    collapse.classList.toggle("open");
  });

  collapse.addEventListener("click", (e) => e.stopPropagation());
  document.addEventListener("click", () => {
    plusBtn.classList.remove("open");
    collapse.classList.remove("open");
  });
});
</script>
```
